name: API Fortress Inc.
description: Provider of a visual API testing and monitoring platform. The company provides a platform that tests and monitors API, notifying users of moment flaws, and facilitates corrective action processes when vulnerabilities are found.
one_liner: Provider of a visual API testing and monitoring platform. The company provides a platform that tests and monitors API, notifying users of moment flaws, and facilitates corrective action processes when vulnerabilities are found.
